creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: embroidered yolk, front and back; small geometric embroidery in orange, green, red and maroon; embroidered neck band in same colors; 1 1/2" machine embroidery around entire yoke area, mostly pink; additional loose red silk 3" border around yoke, gathered in back; lower torso has horizontal applique bands, 4" wide back and front in red print and red and blue silk; sleeves have black and red silk and black and bule cotton; lined in blue denim
title: Jacket
